first_para: Rebecca Elizabeth Harris (born 22 December 1967) is a British Conservative Party politician who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Castle Point.

full.extract:
Rebecca Elizabeth Harris (born 22 December 1967) is a British Conservative Party politician who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Castle Point.
^ "Rebecca Harris MP". BBC Democracy Live (BBC). Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^ "Who's Who". Ukwhoswho.com. Retrieved 2012-03-06.

full.title: Rebecca Harris
